channel.title: Miscellania [NEW Barrows & Prayers Preaching]
channel.description:
[left] [size=14pt]Miscellania[/size]
Server Stage: Beta Client Version: v1
*This is a solo project.
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦
[b]Green = Complete Orange = In-progress Red = Not started[/b]
[IMG]http://runecentre.com/img/news/scroll.gif[/img] [size=12pt][b]Misc. Updates:[/b][/size] [b]●Barrows Minigame - 80% ●Party Room - 60% [/b]
[b]LATEST UPDATE:[/b] Working Prayer Books [b][u]Preview:[/u][/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ur8cOBd.png[/img]
Will add a video soon seeming how screenshots of it wouldn't do it justice. For now all 3 prayer books 'Preach' option works, as well as all 4 options -Wedding rights -Last rights -Blessing -Preach
Only thing I can think of that doesn't make this like RS's is that RS has 4 different qoutes for preaching options (the last option) when preaching with the Holy and Unholy books. At the moment they only preach 1 of the 4 qoutes but tomorrow will have all 4 qoutes randomly generated when trying to preach.
Also all qoutes/prayers are exact to RS except for what was stated above^
Is there anything that I'm missing for the prayer books? Let me know below.
[b][BARROWS]:[/b] ♦Start by teleporting to 'Barrows' through the 'Useful Teleports' tab ♦Kill the 5 shown Barrows brothers atop the 5 surrounding mounds ♦After killing the 5 brothers above ground, dig with a spade into the middle mound where the 'Weird Old Man' is ♦You will be teleported to the crypt ♦(In the upcoming days will feature proper prayer draining every so often when player is in the crypts)
♦Find your way through the crypts and to the center room with the chest [i](Only 1 set of doors will work out of the 4 that lead to the center room)[/i] ♦Kill the last Barrows brother, Ahrim, and then collect your rewards from the chest (Rewards are based directly from RS) ♦Will be teleported up to the middle mound once having done completed the minigame (Next to the 'Weird Old Man') [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xFEfC2h.png[/img] [b][SOME BARROWS INFO]:[/b] ♦When digging on the center mound after killing the first 5 brothers, [i]you will be teleported randomly[/i] to [b]1[/b] of the [b]4[/b] corner rooms in the crypt ♦Opening of the doors, along with their respected trap (such as HP reduction/Prayer draining when attempting to open a door) is currently under construction and when released will be randomized and be a different route to the center room every time ♦Crypt NPCs such as crypt rats/bats/spiders/etc have yet to be added
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N3XM5DI.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K1CYV56.png[/img] I know it's a bad picture but vengeance is fully added including: ●Wears off after 3 minutes if it isn't activated ●Requires proper runes/amounts and gives experience ●Can only be casted once every 30 seconds ●Works in both PvP and PvM situations
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b][size=12pt]Woodcutting:[/size][/b] ●Use of more trees (Not just [b]tree[/b] - [b]magic tree[/b]) ●Use of Inferno Adze as axe w/ requirements ●Trees can be cut down and respawn on a timer
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191028/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Mining:[/size][/b] ●Use of Inferno Adze as pickaxe w/ requirements ●Rocks 'empty' and respawn on a timer
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U7Y2oab.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Hunter[/size][/b] ●Ability to catch Implings w/ [b]lootable jars[/b] ●Ability to catch other RuneScape NPCs ●Ability to catch [b]birds[/b], [b]chimps[/b], and [b]other prey[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BJ7s7C2.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Construction[/size][/b] ●Coming Soon
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p71u7ph.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Summoning[/size][/b] ● Implemented summoning shards and pouches (No use yet) ● Familiar[b] following[/b], [b]calling[/b], and [b]dismissing[/b] ● Familiar special attack, attacking, and BoB inventory
[IMG]http://runecentre.com/img/news/scroll.gif[/img] [size=12pt][b]Misc. Notes:[/b][/size] ●Donator System - 0% ●Dicing System - 0% ●Prestige System - 0%
I am currently looking for Site/Forums Developers Most importantly I need constant suggestions and ideas for the content that will end up being used.
P.S. Try and guess the base I use, and if you already know from previous experiences with me then keep it a secret :p
[/left]

item.title: Miscellania [NEW Barrows & Prayers Preaching]
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

Loveandpower:

by the looks of the inventory…I am guessing allstar? Do you plan to use customs?

Yes it’s an Allstar and the inventory background has been changed.
It came with the client I am so unfortunately forced to use for V1.
If I changed the background picture before I posted the quest tab pictures above would you still have noticed?

And to answer your question, yes I do.
But not in the way you, and probably everyone else, are most likely thinking.

P.S.
I didn’t notice the background skull until I posted the pics and everyone started commented about them lol
So gimme 2 minutes and I’ll change because it is really ugly.

P.S.S.
background changed!

Read full topic

item.title: Miscellania [NEW Barrows & Prayers Preaching]
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:14, topic:515751”]When you push out every 2-3 updates that you do into this thread, it gives the community a reason to constantly come back and check up on your progress. If you just push bulk updates out once every one or two weeks, then people loss interest and feel that you aren’t progressing as smoothly as one should.
Good luck nonetheless, it is your development. :)[/quote]
No, nvm I want exactly what you described so dw, i’ll be showing my updates as they are completed.

Read full topic

item.title: Miscellania [NEW Barrows & Prayers Preaching]
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

When you push out every 2-3 updates that you do into this thread, it gives the community a reason to constantly come back and check up on your progress. If you just push bulk updates out once every one or two weeks, then people loss interest and feel that you aren’t progressing as smoothly as one should.
Good luck nonetheless, it is your development.

Read full topic

item.title: Miscellania [NEW Barrows & Prayers Preaching]
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:12, topic:515751”][quote author=Tom link=topic=634009.msg4295116#msg4295116 date=1368072658]
Goodluck!
[/quote]
Pictures are still quite simple, yet I’m glad to see that you’re making progress. Perhaps provide a thread comment every time you make an update? Remember that you don’t want to do bulk updates until you have a stable player base, this way people will constantly check up on this thread. ;)[/quote]
I don’t really like posting every single little thing I update but I will add important/huge/bulk updates when I actually have a playerbase…especially since I want the majority of the playerbase to vote, or have a say, in the upcoming updates… You should all know from reading the thread that this WILL BE the best allstar out… in terms of RS-related content and professionalism.

P.S.
The skull in the quest tab pictures has been removed.

Read full topic

item.title: Miscellania [NEW Barrows & Prayers Preaching]
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

Flame_:

[quote] 2) Advertising: This section is for showing off (flaunting) your work, not advertising your server and/or forums. Do so and you will be rewarded with a mute or ban.

Read the sectional rules before posting.

Good luck.[/quote].
Lol why don’t you stop beating around the bush and just say it…

@Sup22211 nah lol that would make sense but nah not in this case. Don’t Panic is the name… Pking will play a huge part in this server.

@Fridder didn’t know… seems like a stupid rule though since I can just go into a different section and post my server’s BETA CLIENT but whatever i’ll remove.

Now that we’re passed all of your comments… does anyone care to add any constructive criticism…? or just say what first comes toy our mind and then never visit the thread again?

…Don’t prove me wrong Moparians.

Read full topic

item.title: Miscellania [NEW Barrows & Prayers Preaching]
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[left]
[size=14pt]Miscellania[/size]

Server Stage: Beta
Client Version: v1

*This is a solo project.

Green = Complete
Orange = In-progress
Red = Not started


[size=12pt]Misc. Updates:[/size]
●Barrows Minigame - 80%
●Party Room - 60%

LATEST UPDATE: Working Prayer Books
Preview:

Will add a video soon seeming how screenshots of it wouldn’t do it justice.
For now all 3 prayer books ‘Preach’ option works, as well as all 4 options
-Wedding rights
-Last rights
-Blessing
-Preach

Only thing I can think of that doesn’t make this like RS’s is that RS has 4 different qoutes for preaching options (the last option) when preaching with the Holy and Unholy books. At the moment they only preach 1 of the 4 qoutes but tomorrow will have all 4 qoutes randomly generated when trying to preach.

Also all qoutes/prayers are exact to RS except for what was stated above^

Is there anything that I’m missing for the prayer books? Let me know below.

[BARROWS]:
Start by teleporting to ‘Barrows’ through the ‘Useful Teleports’ tab
Kill the 5 shown Barrows brothers atop the 5 surrounding mounds
After killing the 5 brothers above ground, dig with a spade into the middle mound where the ‘Weird Old Man’ is
You will be teleported to the crypt
(In the upcoming days will feature proper prayer draining every so often when player is in the crypts)

Find your way through the crypts and to the center room with the chest
(Only 1 set of doors will work out of the 4 that lead to the center room)
Kill the last Barrows brother, Ahrim, and then collect your rewards from the chest
(Rewards are based directly from RS)
Will be teleported up to the middle mound once having done completed the minigame
(Next to the ‘Weird Old Man’)

xFEfC2h.png738×771

[SOME BARROWS INFO]:
When digging on the center mound after killing the first 5 brothers, you will be teleported randomly to 1 of the 4 corner rooms in the crypt
Opening of the doors, along with their respected trap (such as HP reduction/Prayer draining when attempting to open a door) is currently under construction and when released will be randomized and be a different route to the center room every time
Crypt NPCs such as crypt rats/bats/spiders/etc have yet to be added


I know it’s a bad picture but vengeance is fully added including:
●Wears off after 3 minutes if it isn’t activated
●Requires proper runes/amounts and gives experience
●Can only be casted once every 30 seconds
●Works in both PvP and PvM situations

[size=12pt]Woodcutting:[/size]
●Use of more trees (Not just tree - magic tree)
●Use of Inferno Adze as axe w/ requirements
●Trees can be cut down and respawn on a timer

[size=12pt]Mining:[/size]
●Use of Inferno Adze as pickaxe w/ requirements
●Rocks ‘empty’ and respawn on a timer


[size=12pt]Hunter[/size]
●Ability to catch Implings w/ lootable jars
●Ability to catch other RuneScape NPCs
●Ability to catch birds, chimps, and other prey


[size=12pt]Construction[/size]
●Coming Soon


[size=12pt]Summoning[/size]
● Implemented summoning shards and pouches (No use yet)
● Familiar following, calling, and dismissing
● Familiar special attack, attacking, and BoB inventory


[size=12pt]Misc. Notes:[/size]
●Donator System - 0%
●Dicing System - 0%
●Prestige System - 0%

I am currently looking for Site/Forums Developers
Most importantly I need constant suggestions and ideas for the content that will end up being used.

P.S.
Try and guess the base I use, and if you already know from previous experiences with me then keep it a secret

[/left]

Read full topic
